property_title: Quarter Share - Two bedroom apartment Pestana Silves Golf Resort Lote 60C and 60D
property_description:
* An affordable way to purchase your overseas home - buy a 1/4 share in this fabulous two bedroom apartment for €110,000 *

Two bedroom apartment belonging to Plot 60 of the exclusive Silves Golf Resort, with direct views of the Fairway.
This modern property is on the ground floor and consists of a large open plan living room with fully equipped kitchen. From this division there is direct access to the terrace of the property that has as "garden" the fairway. Both bedrooms have fitted wardrobes having one of them en suite bathroom with Italian style shower. The second bedroom is supported by a full bathroom and also with Italian style shower.

This property is equipped with electric blinds and air conditioning. At the entrance of the apartment there are two parking spaces being one of them covered with a pergola. The common leisure areas consist of communal pool and gardens. Sold furnished.

The Pestana Silves Golf Resort consists of 1 golf course, club house with restaurant and bar and communal pool for the exclusive use of the owners.

By purchasing a property at one of the Pestana Group Resorts in the Algarve, we guarantee maintenance, gardening and security service 24 hours, of excellence.

We also offer the Resort card to enjoy benefits and advantages in our restaurants and bars together with the Pestana Guest Card (PGC) loyalty program with numerous advantages! 

The dream of owning a beautiful holiday home in the Algarve, with its warm climate,the unique and superb beaches and golf courses, involves a major financial investment and is sometimes difficult to justify if the property is only used occasionally.

We offer an Alternative: The Four Owner Plan

For a relatively small investment you become part owner of a freehold property which is yours to enjoy throughout the year on a rotating basis. You will become an owner together with 3 other independent owners of a modern linked villa with swimming pool in the Pestana Silves Golf, and every 1/4 of the property will be secured by individual title deeds.

Purchasing through this well proven system considerably reduces the cost of ownership as it is split into four equal parts, and each owner uses the property for thirteen weeks of the year. This system has been created to give the opportunity to every owner to enjoy the property throughout the year.

Mainly each owner is not limited to only one period of the year, for example, for one year they may occupy the property during April, August, and December and in the next year March, July, and November. Each property is purchased fully furnished.

The Pestana Group is the largest multinational group of Portuguese origin in the tourism sector, being present in Europe, the Americas and Africa, with more than 100 hotels and 12,000 rooms under direct management, being elected by more than 3.5 million customers/ year.

In hospitality, its main business, the Group operates with four brands: Pestana Hotels & Resorts, Pestana Collection Hotels, Pestana Pousadas de Portugal and Pestana CR7 Lifestyle Hotels.

With the aim of offering complete and attractive products, the Group also operates in several business areas: hospitality, tourist real estate, tourism, golf, casinos and industry.

property_title: Studio Apartment For Sale in Alvor
property_description:
This studio apartment for sale is nestled in a private condominium in Alvor, and enjoys prime location - only two kilometres away from the beach and four minutes away from the city centre.

Situated on the second floor, this apartment comprises a large open concept space featuring a fully fitted kitchen, a lounge area, a spacious bedroom and a convenient bathroom equipped with a jet bathtub. The apartment also boasts a large terrace offering captivating views and serving as an ideal spot for delightful al-fresco dining experiences.

The condominium offers for its residents and guests a welcoming reception area, communal lifts, free internet, an on-site restaurant and bar, outdoor communal terraces, a large swimming pool complete with sunbeds, a children’s pool and landscaped gardens throughout.

Additional features include:air conditioning, double glazed windows, fitted wardrobes and one parking space on the underground parking.

Located within a short distance from the city centre of Alvor, this property offers easy access to a wide range of amenities, from international restaurants, to cosy cafes and convenient supermarkets. The stunning Praia de Alvor is just two kilometres away, while Praia da Rocha is within a 10 minute driving distance.

property_title: 1 bedroom apartment for sale in Colina Verde Resort Moncarapacho
property_description:
Spacious and inviting one-bedroom apartment ( ground floor) with a modern bathroom, a well-equipped kitchenette, and a cozy living area complete with a dining table. The apartment also features a private balcony, offering picturesque views of the resort’s tranquil gardens—a perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the scenery.

 

Nestled within the renowned Colina Verde Resort, this property offers a blend of luxury and tranquility in the eastern Algarve, ideally situated between the charming cities of Tavira and Olhão. Spread over 30 hectares of lush green countryside, the resort is designed for those seeking a peaceful retreat with stunning views. Amenities include an infinity pool with breathtaking panoramic views, a spa with a sauna and ice bath for ultimate relaxation, and a fully-equipped TECHNOGYM fitness center catering to all levels—from leisure workouts to professional athletes.

 

Guests can enjoy the on-site bar with a terrace overlooking the pool, where refreshing drinks like locally inspired fruit sangria can be savored. The resort also provides a dedicated event space within a tented area, perfect for gatherings, weddings, and corporate events, complete with a ping pong table and pool table for additional fun. For sports enthusiasts, a full-sized tennis court, surrounded by palms and expansive skies, is ready for friendly or competitive matches.

 

Colina Verde Resort offers a perfect balance of leisure, wellness, and active experiences, making it an ideal getaway for those seeking relaxation and recreation in the beautiful Algarve.

property_title: 1 Bedroom Apartment  in Portimão
property_description:
Fully-managed, key-ready apartments available to purchase next to the Autódromo Internacional do Algarve Racetrack in Portimão.

This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to gain an affordable investment in the property market in Portugal. As part of a fully-operational, successful rental programme, owners can choose their own usage and then earn income when they're not using their home, thanks to the increasing popularity of the AIA, which host events all-year round.

Sold fully furnished, this one bedroom apartment comprises a spacious living room in open plan with a dining area, a large bedroom, a bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen, complete with appliances, including a stovetop, oven, fridge, water boiler, toaster and washing machine.

All apartments offer convenient access to a large outdoor swimming pool, an indoor pool, fully equipped gym, sauna, spa, bar and restaurant, all available just steps away from your doorstep. As a resident, you will benefit from exclusive discounts on select services.

Additional features include: air conditioning, Wi-Fi, double glazed windows, underground parking and storage room.

Situated less than 20 minutes from Portimão city centre, you can easily immerse yourself in the vibrant culture, entertainment, and shopping that this charming city offers. Additionally, the stunning Meia Praia beach, a pristine stretch of golden sands and turquoise waters, awaits you a mere 23 minutes away. Furthermore, the city centre of Lagos can be reached in approximately 25 minutes, promising a wealth of historical charm and captivating experiences.

Recent renovations include a brand-new traditional floor and a fresh coat of paint throughout. This property holds immense potential, with its tranquil location and stunning views being major highlights.

property_title: Stylish  Fully Renovated 3 bedroom  Two-Unit Townhouse in the Heart of Guia – Albufeira
property_description:
This beautifully renovated two-storey semi-detached townhouse is located in the heart of the picturesque village of Guia, in the municipality of Albufeira. Set on a 75 m² plot with a private gross area of 110.75 m², the property has undergone a complete transformation by a highly regarded interior architect, who created a modern and elegant home while maximising space and natural light. Just a short 10-minute drive from the stunning beaches of Albufeira, such as Praia dos Salgados and Praia da Galé, and only five minutes from the Algarve Shopping Centre, which offers a variety of shops, restaurants, cinemas, and supermarkets, the property is ideally situated for both permanent living and holiday rental potential.

Guia is famously known as the birthplace of Portugals iconic Frango Piri-Piri, or spicy grilled chicken, and is home to numerous traditional restaurants that draw visitors from across the Algarve and beyond. This unbeatable location adds strong rental appeal for investors and an authentic lifestyle for residents.

The property is currently divided into two fully independent apartments, each with a private entrance. The main apartment features an open-plan kitchen that is fully fitted with modern appliances and seamlessly connects with a bright and stylish living and dining area. On the ground floor, there is a spacious ensuite bedroom, while the first floor is dedicated to the master suite, which offers direct access to a large private balcony with excellent sun exposure, equipped with outdoor furniture perfect for relaxing. From the living area, there is also access to a beautifully designed interior patio, ideal for al fresco dining, with a barbecue area, sofas, and a dining table. This unit is fully air-conditioned with new, high-efficiency units and benefits from solar panel water heating, ensuring energy efficiency and lower operating costs. The home is equipped with high-end double-glazed windows and electric shutters for optimal insulation and comfort.

The second apartment, also fully renovated and modern, includes an open-plan kitchen, dining, and living area that opens onto its own private patio, also designed for outdoor dining and lounging, complete with a barbecue setup. A bathroom is located on the ground floor, while an elegant staircase leads to the large upstairs ensuite bedroom, which is flooded with natural light and features a built-in wardrobe and a modern bathroom with a bathtub. This unit offers the same attention to detail, including quality finishes, electric shutters, double-glazed windows, and tasteful décor.

The property also offers private parking with the possibility of installing an electric vehicle charging station, further enhancing its appeal for sustainable living. While currently divided into two independent units, the house can easily be converted back into a single-family home if desired, offering flexibility depending on your lifestyle or investment goals. Whether you're looking for a stylish and energy-efficient home in an authentic Algarvian village or seeking an attractive rental income opportunity, this property represents an outstanding choice.

Don't miss this rare chance to own a turnkey home with unique character and modern comfort in one of the Algarve's most desirable and well-connected locations. Contact Ideal Homes Portugal today to schedule your visit.

When you buy a property in one of the Pestana Group Resorts in the Algarve, we guarantee a maintenance service, gardening and security 24 hours of excellence.


We also offer the Pestana Resort Card to enjoy discounts in our restaurants and bars together with the Pestana Guest Card (PGC) loyalty program with numerous advantages on stays at hotels of the Group.

The dream of owning a beautiful holiday home in the Algarve, with its warm climate,the unique and superb beaches and golf courses, involves a major financial investment and is sometimes difficult to justify if the property is only used occasionally.

We offer an Alternative: The Four Owner Plan

For a relatively small investment you become part owner of a freehold property which is yours to enjoy throughout the year on a rotating basis. You will become an owner together with 3 other independent owners of a modern linked villa with swimming pool in the Pestana Silves Golf, and every 1/4 of the property will be secured by individual title deeds.

Purchasing through this well proven system considerably reduces the cost of ownership as it is split into four equal parts, and each owner uses the property for thirteen weeks of the year. This system has been created to give the opportunity to every owner to enjoy the property throughout the year.

Mainly each owner is not limited to only one period of the year, for example, for one year they may occupy the property during April, August, and December and in the next year March, July, and November. Each property is purchased fully furnished.

For golf lovers, who purchase their property in our resorts, we provide special membership conditions!

The Pestana Group is the largest multinational group of Portuguese origin in the tourism sector, being present in Europe, the Americas and Africa, with more than 100 hotels and 12,000 rooms under direct management, being elected by more than 3.5 million customers/ year.

In hospitality, its main business, the Group operates with four brands: Pestana Hotels & Resorts, Pestana Collection Hotels, Pestana Pousadas de Portugal and Pestana CR7 Lifestyle Hotels.


With the aim of offering complete and attractive products, the Group also operates in several business areas: hospitality, tourist real estate, tourism, golf, casinos and industry.

Our rentals department have seen a large increase in holidaymakers looking for property in Cabanas de Tavira so have been able to provide rental projections as seen below. 

Located ten minutes from the historic city of Tavira, Cabanas is a hidden gem within the Algarve with many sports, activities and beach opportunities available for those willing to explore.

Tavira is one of the oldest Moorish towns in Eastern Algarve, concealing a charismatic heritage until this day, becoming one of the finest resort towns in the area.

The town extends along the river banks of Gilão, where Moorish influences beautifully compliments the deep-rooted Portuguese traditional culture. property_title: Turnkey new  4 Bedroom Villa, Algoz, Silves
property_description:
Benefiting from the quietness of village life this property is ideal for those seeking a modern and sustainable home in a prime central location.
Unlike traditional construction methods this property is built with the advanced Light Steel Frame system guaranteeing both durability and stability while offering optimal insulation and a construction time that is significantly reduced to 12 months.
Using high layers of insulating materials and the absence of thermal bridges the non-polluting materials greatly reduce energy consumption, making the property both modern and environmentally friendly.
The villa’s contemporary architecture beautifully integrates large sliding glass windows allowing you to live "inside-outside" while also bathing the interior in natural light, creating a warm and inviting ambiance while promoting energy efficiency and an enriched living experience.
This villa is perfect for entertaining family and friends, offering both privacy and spaciousness.
It features air conditioning in every room and solar panels for hot water, enhancing energy efficiency. Additionally, there is an option to install underfloor heating across both levels and the possibility of adding a garage or basement for further convenience.
Complete with its own swimming pool, garden and plenty of floor space this property adapts to all the needs of a couple or a family. The ground floor has a large living area incorporating a fully equipped open-plan kitchen.
Algoz, a picturesque town in the Algarve region of southern Portugal, is best known for its serene environment and traditional architecture. With a range of local shops, cafes, and markets, it provides a genuine taste of Portuguese culture while maintaining a tranquil, rural charm. Conveniently located about 40 kilometres from Faro International Airport, Algoz serves as an accessible haven for both residents and tourists exploring the beautiful Algarve.

Faro, the capital of the Algarve, offers the region’s international airport and boasts a vibrant "old town." To the east, the market town of Olhão sits on the Ria Formosa, known for its stunning intercoastal waterways and barrier islands.

The central Algarve is rich in exceptional facilities, including championship golf courses, a world-class marina in Vilamoura, and a wide range of shopping and dining options to suit all tastes. With superb infrastructure, the region is well-equipped to welcome travelers from around the world, providing a high standard of living and luxury experiences.

property_title: 3+1 Bedroom Villa with Pool in Guia, Albufeira
property_description:
Located in the mature and beautifully maintained urbanization of Quinta dos Álamos, Guia  Albufeira, this stunning villa offers the perfect balance of comfort, elegance, and sustainability. Set on a generous plot of 715 m² with a total construction area of 190 m², this home is designed for relaxed Algarve living.

The villa features three spacious bedrooms, two located on the Ground  floor, and the master bedroom ensuite on the first floor,  plus an additional room with a built-in wardrobe that can serve as either an office or a fourth bedroom. The master bedroom is an ensuite and boasts generous dimensions along with a private balcony overlooking the lush gardens and sparkling swimming pool.

The property is nestled within a calm and quiet neighbourhood, surrounded by beautifully kept villas and tree-lined, landscaped streets, all maintained by the Albufeira Municipality.

Step outside, and youll find a large private pool surrounded by a manicured lawn, a jacuzzi, and an inviting outdoor BBQ and dining area. The covered terrace, complete with comfortable outdoor sofas and a dining table for six, includes retractable awnings for thermal comfort and shade, taking full advantage of the Algarves all-day sun.

For energy efficiency, the villa is equipped with solar panels for water heating, warming the pool and jacuzzi even in cooler months, significantly reducing energy consumption. Photovoltaic panels power the house, automatically switching between solar energy during the day and grid power at night, keeping costs low. The property also features double-glazed windows for excellent insulation. Although the official energy certificate is currently rated C, it does not yet reflect these later eco-friendly upgrades.

Inside, youll find a modern, generously sized independent kitchen, equipped with top-quality German appliances, with direct access to a patio. The kitchen is separated from the dining and living rooms, where a cosy fireplace awaits for cooler evenings. The home offers a total of three bathrooms.

Conveniently located just five minutes from Algarve Shopping, one of the largest malls in the Algarve offering cinemas, restaurants, a supermarket, and various amenities, the villa is also only 20 minutes from the centre of Albufeira and its famous beaches.

property_title: Authentic Algarve Living: 3-Bedroom Villa with Annexe and Pool in Pechão
property_description:
This charming detached villa is located in the traditional village of Pechão, only five minutes from Olhão, fifteen minutes from Faro International Airport, and twenty minutes from the beautiful beaches of the Ria Formosa Natural Park. Combining authentic Algarve character with modern upgrades, the property offers the perfect balance between tranquillity and convenience. The main villa welcomes you into a bright and spacious open-plan living area, where large windows flood the room with natural light and a pellet fireplace creates a cosy atmosphere in the cooler months. The living space connects directly to the outdoor terrace and private swimming pool, blending indoor and outdoor living in true Mediterranean style. The kitchen is both practical and spacious, ideal for preparing meals with fresh local produce. On the ground floor there are two comfortable bedrooms and two separate bathrooms, while the first floor is dedicated to a large master suite with en-suite bathroom, private balcony, and charming countryside views.
A unique feature of this property is the detached annexe, currently configured as an artists studio with kitchenette. This versatile space offers incredible potential as a private guest suite, a holiday rental, a home office, or even a personal gym or yoga studio. The outdoor area is designed for low maintenance, with a fully fenced private garden and mature Mediterranean trees. Several terraces provide ideal spots for sunbathing, entertaining, or dining al fresco. A dedicated barbecue and outdoor kitchen area enhances the lifestyle appeal, perfectly suited to enjoying the Algarve climate with family and friends.
This villa is more than just a home; it is a lifestyle choice. Whether as a permanent residence, a holiday retreat, or an investment with strong rental potential, the property stands out for its excellent location close to Olhãos famous markets, the ferry to the barrier islands, Faro Airport, and the pristine beaches of the Ria Formosa.

property_title: Elegant 4-Bedroom Villa with Pool, 2 Garages and Mountain Views for Sale in Paderne, Albufeira
property_description:
Elegant 4-Bedroom Villa with Pool, Garages and Mountain Views for Sale in Paderne, Albufeira
This stunning two-storey villa is located in the peaceful parish of Paderne, within the municipality of Albufeira. Set on a fully enclosed plot with gated entrance, the property offers exceptional privacy and spectacular mountain views, creating the perfect setting for a serene lifestyle in the Algarve.

On the ground floor, the villa features an open-plan design that combines a fully furnished living room with a cosy wood-burning fireplace, a stylish dining area, and a modern kitchen equipped with high-quality appliances that have seen minimal use. A breakfast counter connects the kitchen to the living space, creating a sociable and functional environment. This level also includes a laundry room and an ensuite guest bedroom, which benefits from both interior access and a private exterior entrance, offering flexibility for visitors or extended family.

An elegant staircase leads to the first floor where a bright sitting area filled with natural light opens onto the upper bedrooms. The spacious master suite boasts a dedicated sleeping area, a generous dressing room with fitted wardrobes, and a private balcony with uninterrupted views over the pool area and surrounding mountains. This floor is completed by another bedroom with a balcony facing the pool and a further bedroom that shares a well-appointed family bathroom.

The villa is designed with energy efficiency in mind, featuring solar water heating and a photovoltaic panel system that significantly reduces energy consumption thanks to the property's excellent south-facing orientation. The pool system, including motors and filtration, has been recently updated, ensuring low-maintenance enjoyment. The landscaped gardens are designed for easy upkeep and include a fully automated irrigation system and productive young olive trees. Two private garages and secure parking within the grounds add to the convenience of this exceptional home.

This beautiful property is located approximately 35 kilometres from Faro Airport, making international travel quick and easy. The stunning beaches of Albufeira, including the famous Olhos de Água, Santa Eulália, and Falésia beaches, are all within a short 10 to 12-minute drive. The villa is perfectly positioned for those seeking the tranquillity of the countryside while remaining close to vibrant coastal life. The historic village of Paderne is nearby, offering local restaurants, cultural events, and the charm of traditional Algarve living. This villa is ideal for families, retirees, or buyers looking for a private holiday retreat or investment property with outstanding potential.

Thisexceptional new development offers a range of 1 to 4-bedroom residences. Its striking architecture seamlessly blends with meticulously crafted interiors, designed by the Algarve’s leading design studios. To the east, the market town of Olhão sits on the Ria Formosa, known for its stunning intercoastal waterways and barrier islands.

The central Algarve is rich in exceptional facilities, including championship golf courses, a world-class marina in Vilamoura, and a wide range of shopping and dining options to suit all tastes. With superb infrastructure, the region is well-equipped to welcome travelers from around the world, providing a high standard of living and luxury experiences.

property_title: 2 Bedroom Apartment For Sale in Quinta do Lago
property_description:
An exceptional opportunity in prestigious Quinta do Lago, in the famous 'Golden Triangle' of the Algarve. You can own a luxury residence in a sought-after location with world-class facilities, and generate rental income when you're not using your property. 

The luxury apartments are located in Quinta do Lago, one of the most desirable locations to live in Portugal. Only 20 minutes from Faro Airport, close to the beach and boasting Michelin-starred restaurants and world-class golf, the residences are an ideal choice for an active lifestyle, including time spent playing tennis, golf, learning a new sport or exploring the fabulous Ria Formosa Natural Park.

Or maybe you prefer to relax and enjoy the leisure of shopping among world famous brand-name stores, finishing the day off with a delicious Portuguese meal at one of the many restaurants in the area.

The two bedroom apartments are designed and fitted to the highest specification, and come fully-furnished with stylish contemporary furniture. All residences have a generous balcony or terrace, full-sized kitchen and generous storage space for sporting equipment. The open plan living room and dining area create uninterrupted space. The large bedrooms benefit from an en-suite bathroom and dressing area. The second bedroom offers two single beds, so it's ideal for a small family. 

There's a large outdoor pool with sun beds, parasols and refreshing bar, and a heated indoor pool with views of the picturesque gardens.

This exclusive collection of freehold residences are available now, and will be part of a managed rental programme, tailored to suit your needs. Because your home can be fully-managed and rented when you're not using it, there's also an attractive rental return expected.

More details:

- All the apartments are managed, fully furnished and equipped to 5-Star standards.

- Owners can use their apartment for up to 12 weeks (ad aeternum), with a maximum of 2 weeks in high season and a maximum three weeks in medium season and seven in the low season (winter).

- When using their apartment, owners have access to all of the Hotel’s services and facilities and have owners’ privileges and discounts.

- When owners are not using the apartment, the apartment is available to be rented to guests, ensuring a rental income for as long as they own the apartment.

These apartments are ready now, so you can view, purchase and be benefiting from your new home within a few short months.

One bedroom apartments are also available. Please contact us for more details.

property_title: 2 Bedroom Apartment For Sale in Quinta do Lago
property_description:
An exceptional opportunity in prestigious Quinta do Lago. in the famous 'Golden Triangle' of the Algarve. You can own a luxury residence in a sought-after location with world-class facilities, and generate rental income when you're not using your property.

The luxury apartments are located in Quinta do Lago, one of the most desirable locations to live in Portugal. Only 20 minutes from Faro Airport, close to the beach and boasting Michelin-starred restaurants and world-class golf, the residences are an ideal choice for an active lifestyle, including time spent playing tennis, golf, learning a new sport or exploring the fabulous Ria Formosa Natural Park.

Or maybe you prefer to relax and enjoy the leisure of shopping among world famous brand-name stores, finishing the day off with a delicious Portuguese meal at one of the many restaurants in the area.

The two bedroom apartments are designed and fitted to the highest specification, and come fully-furnished with stylish contemporary furniture. All residences have a generous balcony or terrace, full-sized kitchen and generous storage space for sporting equipment. The open plan living room and dining area create uninterrupted space. The large bedrooms benefit from an en-suite bathroom and dressing area. The second bedroom offers two single beds, so it's ideal for a small family. 

There's a large outdoor pool with sun beds, parasols and refreshing bar, and a heated indoor pool with views of the picturesque gardens.

This exclusive collection of freehold residences are available now, and will be part of a managed rental programme, tailored to suit your needs. Because your home can be fully-managed and rented when you're not using it, you should also be able to generate an attractive rental return.

More details:

- All the apartments are managed, fully furnished and equipped to 5-Star standards.

- Owners can use their apartment for up to 12 weeks (ad aeternum), with a maximum of 2 weeks in high season and a maximum three weeks in medium season and seven in the low season (winter).

- When using their apartment, owners have access to all of the Hotel’s services and facilities and have owners’ privileges and discounts.

- When owners are not using the apartment, the apartment is available to be rented to guests, generating a rental income for as long as they own the apartment.

These apartments are ready now, so you can view, purchase and be benefiting from your new home within a few short months.

One bedroom apartments and three bedroom penthouses are also available. Please contact us for more details.

Upstairs, the master bedroom includes a private bathroom with bathtub and access to a wraparound balcony with open views over the surrounding forest. A third bedroom, also ensuite, offers comfort and privacy for guests or family members.

The property is equipped with air conditioning, an alarm system, solar panels that generate electricity for the house, and a gated parking space with automatic access. With four façades facing north, south, east, and west, the villa benefits from excellent natural light throughout the day.

This home is ideal as a permanent residence, a luxurious holiday retreat, or a smart investment in one of the Algarves most sought-after areas, with some of the highest real estate values per square metre in the region.

property_title: 3 Bedroom expandable Villa , Caramujeira, Carvoeiro
property_description:
This three bedroom villa for sale in Caramujeira, Lagoa, sits on a 4,200m2 plot of land and allows for a further 15% build density taking the existing villa up to a spacious 630m2. Situated less than three kilometres from two beaches: Praia de Albandeira in Porches and Praia da Marinha, it’s also approximately 10 minutes from Lagoa’s centre with all the needed amenities.

Spread across one storey, this property comprises an entrance hallway, a kitchen with fitted appliances such as oven, dishwasher, fridge/freezer etc. A large living room with a feature fireplace and sliding doors leading out to the covered patio area and private garden.

There are three spacious bedrooms, all come with fitted wardrobes and the master bedroom has sliding doors leading out to the terrace shared with the living room.

One bathroom is situated next to the master bedroom, and the second bathroom is located closer to the other two bedrooms. Both bathrooms come equipped with walk-in showers with one having an electric towel heater.

Offering extensive private gardens with a generously sized swimming pool and outdoor BBQ/grill, this property is completely habitable as is and represents a traditional Portuguese style home but has the potential to be entirely renovated and expanded into a modern villa.

Additional features include:English style radiators, underfloor heating, manual shutters, solar panels, borehole, driveway with electric gates and an intercom system.

The current owner does have various different floor plans showing what can be done with the villa so get in touch for more information. For reference on what can be done and possible scenarios, please see the below:

  • Borehole: Yes

  • City Electricity: Yes

property_title: Elegant Silves Villa T5  – Combining Algarve Tradition with Modern Sophistication
property_description:
Elegant Silves Villa T5   Combining Algarve Tradition with Modern Sophistication

Nestled in the heart of Silves picturesque orange groves, this magnificent estate offers an unparalleled blend of classic Algarvian charm and modern luxury. Situated just 45 km from Faro Airport and 16 km from Albufeiras world-renowned beaches, this property promises serenity and accessibility in equal measure.
Built in 1973 and tastefully restored in 1993, the villa spans 588 m² of living space on a private, fully enclosed 5,000 m² plot. The estates meticulously landscaped gardens boast mature trees that provide natural shade, a charming Victorian fountain, and a six-zone automated irrigation system linked to a private borehole, ensuring a lush and vibrant landscape year-round.
The residence greets you with an impressive gated entrance leading to a cobblestone courtyard, offering an elegant first impression. Inside, the grand entrance hall flows seamlessly into the spacious living room, featuring a fireplace and large glass doors that open onto a terrace overlooking the expansive pool area. The ground floor also includes a generously proportioned kitchen perfect for culinary pursuits, a formal dining room, a snooker room with a full-size table, an office, and utility spaces.
The first floor houses a stunning master suite, complete with a walk-in closet, luxurious ensuite bathroom, and access to a private terrace with breathtaking views of the pool and gardens. Two additional bedroomsone with a balcony overlooking the pool and the other with courtyard viewsare served by a shared bathroom. A self-contained two-bedroom apartment with private access and an open-plan kitchen and living area adds versatility, ideal for hosting guests or extended family.
The outdoor areas are a haven of leisure and relaxation. The centerpiece is a 10x5 meter pool surrounded by a spacious patio, bar, and solarium, all benefiting from the villas south-facing orientation for maximum sunlight. Mature trees and lush greenery enhance the peaceful ambiance, offering a cool retreat during warm summer days.
Designed to meet the demands of modern living, the property is equipped with sustainable features, including a borehole water supply and a sophisticated waste management system. These thoughtful upgrades ensure comfort and convenience without compromising the estates timeless elegance.
This exquisite property is an ideal family home, a luxurious holiday retreat, or a savvy investment opportunity. Combining authentic Algarvian heritage with contemporary refinement, it offers the best of the Algarve in one extraordinary package.

Contact Ideal Homes Portugal today to schedule your private viewing and step into your dream lifestyle.

property_title: Rental Investment Opportunity, 5 Refurbished Units, Albufeira
property_description:
Fully refurbished rental investment property for sale in Albufeira – 5 separate units, across 2 separate addresses next door to each other.

An exceptional investment opportunity awaits in the sought-after coastal town of Albufeira, nestled in the heart of Portugal's Algarve region. This fully refurbished rental property offers not only a prime location but also the potential for strong rental income and long-term appreciation.

Situated just moments from Albufeira’s golden beaches and surrounded by popular restaurants, shops, and lively attractions, this property is a gem for both tourists and investors alike.

This investment consists of two neighboring properties combined into one outstanding offering. Together, they encompass five fully independent and self-contained rental units, all spanning across three beautifully designed floors. Each unit has been meticulously refurbished with an emphasis on modern style, comfort, and functionality. From contemporary flooring to upgraded lighting fixtures, every detail of the renovation has been carefully planned to cater to the modern traveler.

Fully Furnished and Equipped – Ready for Rental

Each unit comes fully furnished and tastefully decorated, ensuring a seamless, turnkey operation for the next owner. The furniture has been carefully selected to reflect a sophisticated yet cosy aesthetic, making the units appealing to short-term guests. Comfortable sofas, stylish dining sets, and plush beds ensure that guests can enjoy a welcoming home-away-from-home experience. TVs, ample storage, and modern decor further elevate each space, creating a blend of elegance and comfort that will leave guests delighted.

In addition to the furnishings, all kitchen goods are also included in the sale, allowing for immediate rental potential. The kitchens in each unit are fully equipped with high-quality appliances, utensils, cookware, and dinnerware, providing guests with everything they need to prepare meals. From sleek refrigerators to state-of-the-art stove-tops, every kitchen is ready for use, making it easy for guests to cook, relax, and enjoy their stay.

Spectacular Views of Albufeira

The location of this property is nothing short of spectacular. Perched in a prime area, the property boasts stunning views of Albufeira’s iconic landscapes, with many of the units offering picturesque vistas of the charming old town, the Atlantic Ocean, and the sprawling beaches below. These views are a significant selling point and enhance the allure of each rental unit, ensuring happy and returning guests.

Unbeatable Location – Close to the Beach and Attractions

Location is everything when it comes to rental properties, and this one does not disappoint. Guests can walk to some of Albufeira’s most beautiful beaches, including Praia dos Pescadores and Praia da Oura, within minutes. The vibrant town center, known for its lively nightlife, variety of restaurants, and bustling marina, is also just a short stroll away. The proximity to the beach, combined with easy access to all the local attractions, ensures that guests will have everything they need for an unforgettable vacation right at their fingertips.

Lucrative Rental Income

This property is not only a beautiful place for guests to stay but also a highly lucrative investment. Last year's rental earnings exceeded €140,000, and the owner anticipates that this year’s income will surpass €160,000. All five units are currently licensed under AL (Alojamento Local) regulations.

Whether you're an experienced investor or new to the rental market, this property represents a rare opportunity to acquire a turnkey investment in one of the Algarve's most popular tourist destinations. With strong occupancy rates, excellent income potential, and fully furnished units ready for immediate rental, this is a remarkable opportunity that offers both short-term rewards and long-term value appreciation. Don’t miss out on the chance to invest in a thriving business with everything you need for success already in place.

It could even be a place for someone who can assist in taking care of the property to stay or even as a way of generating an additional income through rentals.

property_title: 3+2 Bedroom Villa For Sale in Vale da Lama
property_description:
This 3-bedroom villa is located in Vale da Lama, a quiet area just east of Lagos with stunning views over Alvor’s lagoons and across to the Atlantic Ocean. The closest beach is less than 2 kilometres away; Praia do Vale do Lama.

Situated on an expansive estate spanning 1.77 hectares, this property totals 591m2, was built in 2006 by an English builder, is accessed through electric gates with a large calcada driveway and features a triple car garage.

Complemented by a solid antique-style door, the entrance to the property leads into a main hallway with an Italian marble staircase and a high vaulted ceiling adorned with a chandelier. From the entrance, on the left, there is a formal 10-seater dining area and straight ahead, there is a spacious lounge with high ceilings, a feature fireplace, and sliding doors leading out to the terrace and private grounds.

Underfloor heating, powered by a gas boiler and underfloor water heating, spans the entire property, including the bespoke kitchen by Clive Christian. Featuring a large centre island, gas range stove with an electric oven, and a secondary lounge area with sliding doors, this area also has sliding doors leading outside. Plus, there is a laundry room adjacent to the kitchen with a technical area for the solar boiler.

The ground floor hosts a sizable bedroom with built-in fitted wardrobes, an en-suite bathroom with a walk-in shower, thermal shutters, and views of the lagoon of Alvor. An office has been signed on this floor but has been repurposed as an additional bedroom for now, alongside an extra WC.

Upstairs, the master bedroom comprises wood flooring, a large walk-in closet, an ensuite bathroom with a bathtub and walk-in shower plus access to the shared terrace overlooking the expansive grounds and Alvor lagoon. The second bedroom also has an ensuite bathroom equipped with a walk-shower, fitted wardrobes and access to the shared terrace.

Downstairs in the basement, there is a games room with a full-sized snooker table and pinball machine, plus a storage room, single bedroom, another bathroom with a walk-shower and a wine cellar.

The property includes air-conditioning throughout, photovoltaic solar panels, an orchard with olive and fig trees, a sizable swimming pool, and a Jacuzzi.

Additionally, there is a computerised auto-irrigation system, a tennis court, and a poly-tent for cultivating fruits and vegetables, complete with a separate irrigation system.

Odiaxere, a village nestled in Portugal's West Algarve, sits a short distance from the historic town of Lagos. Enveloped by picturesque countryside and in proximity to the area's finest beaches, Odiaxere presents a serene, laid-back lifestyle while providing convenient access to essential amenities.

To the right, sleek black-framed glass doors open onto a sun-filled living room, an elegant library, and an en-suite guest bedroom, all with direct access to expansive terraces and gardens. The formal dining room connects seamlessly to a modern, fully-equipped kitchen that flows naturally to an outdoor dining area designed for long summer evenings.

The upper level houses the sumptuous master suite, complete with a spa-inspired bathroom, a grand dressing room, and an adjoining office or additional bedroom. Both upstairs bedrooms open onto a south-facing balcony, offering panoramic views over landscaped gardens, the heated swimming pool, and extending towards the glistening Atlantic.

A separate guest annex, linked by a charming winter lounge, provides three further bedrooms, a private living/dining area, a full kitchen, and its own covered terrace. From here, landscaped pathways lead to the main gardens and pool, passing a serene pond and a dedicated BBQ and outdoor kitchen space.

The leisure facilities are nothing short of exceptional: a 12x9 metre heated swimming pool, a modern wooden guest cottage, vegetable gardens, shaded retreats, and a fully equipped outdoor entertaining area. Modern comforts include underfloor heating throughout, 15 kW photovoltaic solar panels, solar hot water, air conditioning, electric gates, a full security system, and a two-car garage.

Location & Access
Perfectly positioned for both privacy and convenience, the estate lies approximately 1213 km (1520 minutes by car) from Taviras historic centre, with its marina, fine dining, and boutique shopping. The golden sands of the Algarves famous island beaches  Ilha de Tavira, Praia do Barril, and Cabanas  are all within a short drive, offering pristine swimming waters and traditional beachfront restaurants. Faro International Airport is around 40 km away via the A22 motorway, making international travel effortless.

This is more than a property  it is a lifestyle statement. Whether as a luxurious private residence, a refined holiday retreat, or an exclusive hospitality investment, it stands as one of the Algarves most distinguished estates.

property_title: Ocean View 5 Bedroom Villa For Sale in Galé
property_description:
This five bedroom contemporary villa for sale is located in the sought-after area of Galé, just a short 500-metre walk to the east side of Praia Manuel Lourenço. Spanning 1,000m2, this property features an internal construction area of 780m2 with expansive terraces, all situated on a generous 900m2 plot, it’s anticipated to be completed by the end of February 2024.

The basement will feature a spa, gym, cinema room, games room with a bar, and a chill-out room for massages. Additionally, a 5-car garage, cascading water features visible through glass walls, and technical rooms for heating systems and water storage add to the convenience.

The ground floor showcases a Portuguese calçada driveway with a graduated slope for sports cars, a 100m2 living room with a dining area and a feature fireplace, a fully equipped kitchen with a central island and pantry, and a garden with a pool and water mirror.

There are two bedrooms on the ground floor, both with en-suite bathrooms and their own private terraces.

Moving to the first floor, there are three further bedrooms: The master suite boasts a walk-in wardrobe, bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathtub, a private terrace with a Jacuzzi, bar, and lounge area overlooking the garden. This room also comes with triple glazed windows with blinds inside the glass to provide enhanced privacy.

The other two bedrooms are situated away from the master and also come with their own private bathrooms, built-in wardrobes and terraces.

This property boasts two exclusive lifts: a stylish main lift with glass walls, going from the basement to the roof terrace, and a discreet service lift located at the back, connecting the basement to the first floor.

The top floor offers a rooftop terrace with panoramic views, a gas fire pit, and artificial grass, complemented by solar panels for sustainable energy production.

In terms of design and comfort, the property incorporates climate-controlled glass with lamination, ensuring privacy from outside while preserving breathtaking external views. Centralised air-conditioning, a domotics intelligent home system programmable via mobile phone, and CCTV cameras contribute to the seamless living experience. Underfloor heating with a heat pump, thermal insulation ranging from 6cm to 8cm, and photovoltaic electric-producing solar panels further enhance energy efficiency.

This villa combines luxury, technology, and comfort, offering an unparalleled living experience on the Algarve coast.

Galé is a charming coastal area nestled within the picturesque Algarve region of Portugal, renowned for its stunning beaches and serene landscapes. The centre of Guia is just a short 11 minute drive from the property and is known for its charming ambiance and traditional Portuguese architecture. Famous for its delicious chicken piri-piri, the town offers a blend of cultural richness and coastal beauty.

property_title: Exceptional Country Estate for Sale in the Algarve - With Commercial Golden Visa Licence
property_description:
Exceptional Country Estate for Sale in the Algarve

A rare and distinguished opportunity to acquire one of the Algarve’s most remarkable country estates. Perfectly situated just 5 minutes from Estoi, 12 minutes from Faro International Airport, and 10 minutes from the MAR Shopping Centre, this estate offers unparalleled privacy, convenience, and lifestyle.

Set on a private plot of 30,000m², the estate comprises a grand 1,525m² villa boasting luxurious amenities such as a private spa, exclusive 9-hole golf course, and multiple indoor and outdoor entertainment areas. The villa’s elevated, south-facing position delivers sweeping panoramic views across pristine countryside, the Ria Formosa, and the Atlantic Ocean.

With 14 bedrooms, 18 bathrooms, and extensive living spaces, this property is ideally suited for large families, high-end entertaining, or as a boutique hospitality venture.

Property Highlights

Main Residence & Accommodation

  • -  1,525m² net internal area; 1,722m² total gross area including pool and terraces

  • -  12 en-suite bedrooms with private terraces or balconies

    • -  Includes 5 master suites with private living rooms and 4 large suites with lounge areas

  • -  2 independent staff apartments

  • -  Two expansive living rooms (designed for summer and winter use), each with fireplaces

  • -  Formal dining room with seating for 22 guests

  • -  Temperature-controlled wine cellar accommodating over 1,000 bottles

  • -  Den with sports bar and TV area

  • -  Library, study, office, and cinema/media room

  • -  Professional-grade kitchen and additional service kitchen

Wellness & Recreational Amenities

  • -  Heated outdoor swimming pool with dedicated changing and bathroom facilities

  • -  Spa with two treatment rooms, sauna, Turkish steam bath, and whirlpools

  • -  Private sandy beach area by Pine Lake, known as "Palm Beach"

  • -  Eco-friendly 9-hole private golf course with water features

  • -  Rooftop terrace with bar offering panoramic countryside and ocean views

  • -  Outdoor entertainment spaces including four gazebos, sun decks, and BBQ areas

Outdoor & Garden Features

  • -  Landscaped gardens with waterfalls, koi ponds, lakes, and water jets

  • -  Elegant gated entrance with palm trees, calçada stone driveway, Italian cypress, and centuries-old olive trees

  • -  Parking for up to 18 vehicles

  • -  Private golf practice area

Technology & Security

  • -  10 photovoltaic solar panels supplying energy to the villa and grounds

  • -  Whole-property satellite TV, Wi-Fi, and audio system

  • -  Integrated fire, gas leak, and intrusion detection systems

  • -  Backup hot water system powered by a large gas tank

  • -  Access to mains water, borehole supply, and a large reserve tank

  • -  Air conditioning and ceiling fans in all main areas

  • -  Individual safes in all bedrooms, plus a secure office safe

  • -  Emergency stair exits for all bedrooms

Prime Location

  • -  5 minutes to Estoi

  • -  12 minutes to Faro International Airport

  • -  10 minutes to MAR Shopping Centre

  • -  20 minutes to Vale do Lobo and Quinta do Lago golf resorts

  • -  30 minutes to Monte Rei Golf & Country Club

  • -  Close to Algarve’s renowned beaches, cultural sites, and gourmet dining

This exclusive estate offers a peaceful sanctuary blending refined elegance, absolute privacy, and a resort-style atmosphere in one of southern Europe’s most desirable locations.

Additional Information

  • - The property is fully registered in Portugal and held by a Portuguese company
  • - Ownership structured through two offshore companies and a Jersey-based trust
  • - Commercial licence in place – suitable for Golden Visa applications and investment opportunities
  • - Ideal for single or multiple investors
  • - Versatile for personal, corporate, or hospitality use
  • - Details available upon request for a second adjoining 7-bedroom villa

property_title: Villa with 4 Bedrooms for Sale in Galé
property_description:
This luxurious, modern gated villa sits atop a hill, offering breathtaking views of the coast and countryside. Within walking distance of supermarkets, restaurants, and cafes, it’s also only a 5-minute drive from the stunning beaches of Galé, São Rafael, and Evaristo, and just 30 minutes from Faro Airport.

Designed by a renowned Portuguese architect, the villa blends contemporary design with Moroccan colors and influences. Each room is spacious, full of natural light, and thoughtfully designed with large glass doors that open to the pool and garden areas, allowing magnificent views from every angle.

The villa features 4 en-suite bedrooms with ample wardrobe space, including a master suite with a dressing area, a Jacuzzi bath, and sea views. An additional room is currently used as an office but can easily serve as a fifth bedroom or children’s playroom.

The open-plan, fully fitted kitchen includes a breakfast bar overlooking the dining area, and the main living room boasts a stylish fireplace with an integrated sound and TV system. The property is equipped with air conditioning and underfloor heating throughout.

Outdoor spaces are meticulously landscaped, inviting you to enjoy every moment outside. The swimming pool and terraces lead to an al fresco dining area, complete with outdoor furniture and a BBQ area overlooking a large Koi pond surrounded by lush greenery.

From the villa’s outdoor spaces, you can enjoy views of both the sea and the Monchique mountains. Additional features include a tennis court, cactus garden, vegetable patch, and fruit orchard. The basement offers two storage rooms and a temperature-controlled wine cellar.

This villa is an idyllic choice for those looking to retire, relocate, or settle with family in a scenic and luxurious setting.

property_title: Luxury Villa For Sale in Silves
property_description:
A spectacular villa for sale in Silves, close to the historic town centre with a main house, guest houses, luxury finishes, cinema and a wellness area. The property offers total privacy and luxurious living to the utmost.

This villa is a unique and one of a kind property with all the features and fixtures you can dream of.

Designed in a mixture of traditional and contemporary styles, this property offers 360 degree views and is set on a large piece of land with many areas to relax and enjoy the sun set and a drink while experiencing all the pleasures Algarve has to offer.

Additionally, a full service package (house cleaning, gardening, maintenance and guarantee on technical equipment, basically offering the experience of moving into a new house) can also be included with the purchase.

The villa comprises of the following:

- 3 bedrooms and 7 bathrooms (3 ensuite)
- Reception lounge
- Living and dining room
- Kitchen
- TV lounge and games room
- Three car garage
- Walk-in-fridge and food storage room
- Drive-in-storage hall
- Indoor-outdoor pool
- Spa with regular and infrared sauna
- Massage room
- Home cinema
- Elevator

The rooms are spacious and natural light fills the house. The floors are covered in travertine stone slabs and the doors are a rich walnut wood. The products have been selected carefully to complement the design of the house.

There is an option to increase the number of bedrooms and bathrooms in the main house as per plans that were designed initially.

The first guest house comprises of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and living room.

The second guest house comprises of 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, living room and a discrete outdoor shower area.

The staff accommodation comprises of 2 bedroom, 2 bathrooms and 2 kitchen/living areas.

Included with the purchase of this estate an option can be offered, for the new owners to produce their own wine from their own vines while taking full advantage of an established wine-making team and installations. A complete turn-key experience that allows full control, while the work and operations are outsourced.

Additionally several surrounding land plots may also be included in the sale. This will allow for more privacy or even the construction of anther guest house.

This amazing property is located in a very central location and is close to all local amenities such as supermarkets and cafes, only minutes away from various beaches, as well as Silves Golf Course and an international school if you are looking to relocate the whole family to the Algarve.

This is a unique opportunity to own a property that caters for all your needs.

Silves is one of the oldest towns in central Algarve, with its rich history, built on the banks of the River Arade. The river represented an important historic time as it was the main link between the hinterland and the coast.

Faro International Airport, is a mere 40-minute drive from the property.

This brand new one bedroom apartment for sale is located within a new development under construction in the heart of Loulé, Portugal. Comprising a range of one to four bedroom modern apartments, this stunning development is expected to complete in 2024.
